name: Pump It Up: Exceed
synopsis: Mastiff Games brings the popular dance pad arcade game Pump It Up to consoles with Pump It Up: Exceed. There are more than 100 songs to choose from and five levels of difficulty. You can unlock new content, like new songs and modifiers, which can adjust gameplay in a variety of ways. Pump It Up: Exceed has two-player modes with two mats and a one-player, two-mat mode.
